ru: Тыльную часть одной ладони поместите под лоб.
en: Gently rest the dorsal side of one palm beneath your forehead.
Position the opposite palm beneath the chin.

ru: Рёбра стоп прижмите друг к другу
en: Press the edges of your feet firmly together.
Position your heels away from each other.
Focus your attention on your heels.
Shift your focus to your abdomen.
Focus on the muscles of your back.
Focus your attention on your face.
Expand your awareness to encompass your entire body.
